about.line1: I've been developing myself in digital design for 8 years.
about.long_description: I am Kaan Güneş. I'm a student at ITU MTAL Information Technologies. I've been into graphic design for over 8 years. Beyond my designer identity, I'm improving myself in areas like IoT as a tech enthusiast. In this context, I qualified to join the Erasmus program held in the Netherlands in 2025. I've also been deeply interested in the Generative AI world since day one, developing myself in this direction as an independent expertise.
